Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Class XMLUtils

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.XMLUtils
public class XMLUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains implementation of the useful actions with the XML content.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
JUnit tests

      Parameters:
      xml - XML content to validate
      xsd - XSD to check validation
      Returns:
      true is the XML content is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null

    • validateAndLoadXML

      public static org.w3c.dom.Document validateAndLoadXML​(java.io.InputStream xml, java.io.InputStream xsd, LoggerFacade logger) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, ContentException

      Validate XML content by it's XSD and load DOM

      Parameters:
      xml - XML content to validate and load
      xsd - XSD to check validation
      logger - logger facade to print error messages
      Returns:
      DOM if the XML content is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      ContentException - on any validation problems
      Since:
      0.0.3

    • walkDownXML

      public static ContinueMode walkDownXML​(org.w3c.dom.Element root, XMLUtils.XMLWalkerCallback callback) throws ContentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Walk down by DOM XML tree

      Parameters:
      root - DOM XML tree root
      callback - callback to process on every DOM XML node
      Returns:
      Continue mode after last node exited. Can't be null
      Throws:
      ContentException - on any processing exceptions
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

    • walkDownXML

      public static ContinueMode walkDownXML​(org.w3c.dom.Element root, long nodeTypes, XMLUtils.XMLWalkerCallback callback) throws ContentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Walk down by DOM XML tree

      Parameters:
      root - DOM XML tree root
      nodeTypes - filter for node types (see XMLConstants) for details
      callback - callback to process on every DOM XML node
      Returns:
      Continue mode after last node exited. Can't be null
      Throws:
      ContentException - on any processing exceptions
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

    • getAttribute

      public static <T> T getAttribute​(org.w3c.dom.Element node, java.lang.String attribute, java.lang.Class<T> awaited) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Extract attribute value from current node and convert it to the given type

      Type Parameters:
      T - attribute type
      Parameters:
      node - node to extract attribute from
      attribute - attribute name
      awaited - attribute type awaited
      Returns:
      attribute extracted or null if missing
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if conversion failed for the given attribute

    • getAttribute

      public static <T> T getAttribute​(org.w3c.dom.Element node, java.lang.String attribute, java.lang.Class<T> awaited, T defaultValue) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Extract attribute value from current node and convert it to the given type

      Type Parameters:
      T - attribute type
      Parameters:
      node - node to extract attribute from
      attribute - attribute name
      awaited - attribute type awaited
      defaultValue - default value when attribute is missing
      Returns:
      attribute extracted or null if missing
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if conversion failed for the given attribute

    • getAttributes

      public static java.util.Properties getAttributes​(org.w3c.dom.Element node) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Get attributer from current node

      Parameters:
      node - node to extract attributes from
      Returns:
      attributes extracted. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if node is null

    • joinAttributes

      public static java.util.Properties joinAttributes​(org.w3c.dom.Element node, java.util.Properties toJoin, boolean retainExistent, boolean assignJoined) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Join a set of attributes with existent attributes of the given node, and optionally replace the given node with attributes joined

      Parameters:
      node - note to join attributer for
      toJoin - set of attributes to join
      retainExistent - true - prevent existent attribute from overwrite
      assignJoined - true - really replace attributes for the given node, false - join attributes, but not replace then in the node
      Returns:
      a set of joined attributes. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
